mapper.update: update hotel_room set attachFileCnt = (select count(room_id) from room_attach where room_id=#{room_id}) where room_id = #{room_id}
mapper.insert: insert into hotel_room(room_id, bno, room_type, room_info, room_number, capacity, price, available) values(hotel_room_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{room_type}, #{room_info}, #{room_number}, #{capacity}, #{price}, #{available})
